sentence: “I look forward to earning his endorsement in the general election and working with him to defeat Tim Ryan in November.” Trump’s decision on Friday to throw his weight behind Vance is not surprising given that Vance has been pushing Trumpism for months, most notably in taking a hard line on immigration.
